api_list.name: searchByQuery

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: searchparameters and results are in a specific language defined in ISO-639-1 (default de). see the possible values of currently supported languages!

optional_parameters.name: displayFormatDelimiter
optional_parameters.description: the delimiter char(s) used when formatting the display name; NOTE that some characters has to be URL-Encoded according to RFC 3986

optional_parameters.name: visualization
optional_parameters.description: if true, the field visualizationUrl contains a url to visualize the geo-code on a map

optional_parameters.name: addAttributeMatch
optional_parameters.description: if true, the response contains the AttributeMatch object which describes the individual match of the attributes of the searched place to the attributes of the response result.

api_list.name: searchByAttributes

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: searchparameters and results are in a specific language defined in ISO-639-1 (default de). see the possible values of currently supported languages!

optional_parameters.name: visualization
optional_parameters.description: if true, the field visualizationUrl contains a url to visualize the geo-code on a map

optional_parameters.name: displayFormatDelimiter
optional_parameters.description: the delimiter char(s) used when formatting the display name; NOTE that some characters has to be URL-Encoded according to RFC 3986

optional_parameters.name: streetAndNumber
optional_parameters.description: filter for street and streetnumber concatenated

optional_parameters.name: addAttributeMatch
optional_parameters.description: if true, the response contains the AttributeMatch object which describes the individual match of the attributes of the searched place to the attributes of the response result.
